buildCommand: mkdir -p dist && cd apps/dashboard && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../../dist/dashboard && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/dashboard/ && cd ../fifi && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../../dist/appraisal && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/appraisal/ && cd ../landing-page && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/
